cause.description:
buckethead is the poster child for the abstract and colourful. He inspires people to be unique and creative through his lifestyle. he shows that life should be celebrated with uncertainty and semi-tones. this is not a cause for money but for awareness that everyone should where a bucket on their head and submerge themselves in music.
1. wear a bucket on your head
2. play an instrument
3. drink a beer
cause.mission: ensure that life is abstract and colourful
cause.name: cheers and beers to buckethead
